lead_paragraph: Thomas Bjorn was appointed as captain of Europe's 2018 Ryder Cup team on Tuesday, a reward for his long and successful association with the event as a player and vice-captain as well as his commitment to the European Tour.

headline.print_headline: Thomas Bjorn Appointed Europe's Ryder Cup Captain for 2018
headline.main: Thomas Bjorn Appointed Europe's Ryder Cup Captain for 2018
